metadata.name: A Christmas Carol (Markosia)
metadata.description: From Stephen L. Stern, writer of Markosia's masterful Beowulf Graphic Novel, and acclaimed artist Douglas A. Sirois, comes this superb full-color adaptation of Dickens' timeless classic.  Sacrificing none of Dickens' rich language and filled with cinematic artwork, A Christmas Carol is a wonderfully faithful adaptation of the quintessential Christmas story.
